long_description: Modest in size and with a slim silhouette, the REI Parkrose Convertible purse carries your basics while keeping your load light. 2 carrying straps of different lengths are included for versatility. Adjustable, long-length shoulder strap allows you to wear the Parkrose across your body or on your shoulder; switch to the short-length strap for additional carrying options. Main opening secures with a magnetic-flap closure. Interior features organization for cards and has a fleece-lined pocket for protection of phone or small accessories; key clip keeps your keys handy. REI Parkrose Convertible purse is made from partially recycled, post-consumer fabric which holds up well against urban elements.
short_description: Modest in size and with a slim silhouette, the REI Parkrose Convertible purse carries your basics while keeping your load light. 2 carrying straps of different lengths are included for versatility.
